meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Adkison Eileen McQuiggan Mary Harris Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6358.

td.p: Dan Adkison, a copy editor from Brooklyn, New York
Eileen McQuiggan, a former teacher and stay-at-home mom from Orlando, Florida
Mary Harris, a knitting store owner from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,900)

tr.td: I WANT A GREEN CAR
(Alex: Not the color green.)
CHARACTERS BASED ON REAL PEOPLE
A PREFIXER UPPER
NEWSPAPERS
THE STAFF OF THE DANA CARVEY SHOW
(Sarah: ...from Lesedi Cultural Village, the rainbow you'd expect from a country with 11 official languages.)

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This company's LPG-powered Elantra was introduced in Korea in 2009

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from Lesedi Cultural Village in South Africa.) The Xhosa hymn "Nkosi Sikelel\' iAfrika" evolved into the South African national anthem; "Nkosi" is God, so the title means this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from Lesedi Cultural Village in South Africa.) The Xhosa hymn "Nkosi Sikelel' iAfrika" evolved into the South African national anthem; "Nkosi" is God, so the title means this
